name: Windows Migration Backup File
summary: Learn about .MIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: USMT is commonly used to migrate large deployments whereas Windows Easy Transfer is used for migrating one computer at a time. MIG files can be stored remotely, locally, or directly on the destination computer during the migration process.
MIG files are used for upgrades of Windows operating systems.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
